name: ListItemCollapseComponent

inputsClass.name: collapseWay
inputsClass.rawdescription:
The way how to toggle collapse state.
button (default) - additional button for toggle collapse state
row - toggling collapse state by clicking to entire row.
inputsClass.description: The way how to toggle collapse state. button (default) - additional button for toggle collapse state row - toggling collapse state by clicking to entire row.

description:
Display collapsed content on a list item. Can be used for more detailed information. Use it with content projection.

Example :
<c8y-li>
  <c8y-collapsed>
    <strong>I am only visible if extended</strong>
  </c8y-collapsed>
</c8y-li>
rawdescription: Display collapsed content on a list item. Can be used for more detailed information. Use it with content projection. ```html I am only visible if extended ```
